title: Sci-Fi Weapons Sound Pack 1
description: A Futuristic Weapon Sound Pack containing 603 sound effects for single and burst shots, reloading, gun drop and pick up, empty magazine sounds, including mono and stereo versions of audio files. There are 26 guns in total.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/sci-fi-weapons-sound-pack-1

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/aisycxes82py63b/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Weapons%20Sound%20Pack%201_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The sound pack contains the main 3 folders - "Bullets", "Foley", "Weapons":


  1. "Bullets" are the sounds of bullets flying by - 32 sound effects inside.
  2. In the folder "Foley" you will find the sounds of dropping and picking up weapons - 24 sound effects inside.
  3. The massive "Weapons" folder includes 13 sub-folders of weapons - 26 different guns in total - 547 sound effects inside, consisting of sounds of single shots, double shots, sounds of burst shots, reloads, sounds of an empty magazine or a cartridge being loaded or a trigger pulled.


The types of guns are listed below:


  • BioGun - 2 types
  • Blaster - 2 types
  • Cannon - 2 types
  • ElectroGun - 2 types
  • EnergyGun - 2 types
  • HeavyRifle - 2 types
  • MachineGun - 2 types
  • Pistol - 2 types
  • PlasmaGun - 2 types
  • PowerGun - 2 types
  • Rifle Laser - 2 types
  • ShotGun - 2 types
  • SniperRifle - 2 types


There are 8 single shots, 5 double shots of different speeds, 5 burst shots of different speeds, 2 reload sounds, 1 empty magazine sound for each gun.


Each sound effect is available in mono and stereo versions.


Use this asset to create high-quality gun shots and weapon sounds for your game, animation or trailer.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 603 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, mono & stereo
  • 1206 audio files
  • 26 guns in total
  • 208 single shot sounds
  • 130 double shots, 130 burst shots
  • 52 reloading sounds
  • 26 empty magazine sounds
  • 1 cannon starting sound
  • 32 bullets flying by
  • 24 dropping and picking up
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for shooters, strategies and more


Number of Audio Waves: 1206

Number of Audio Cues: 1206

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 16 minutes 32 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
